alert.note: Alert for Decatur; Grady (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 13 at 3:33PM EDT until June 13 at 4:45PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Decatur County in southwestern Georgia... Northwestern Grady County in southwestern Georgia... * Until 445 PM EDT. * At 333 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near West Bainbridge, or 7 miles west of Bainbridge, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Cairo, Bainbridge, Whigham, West Bainbridge, Climax, Brinson, Vada, Hanover, Ausmac, Akridge, Capel, Elpino, Eldorendo, Decatur Co A/P, Steinham Store, Harrells Still, Cyrene, Peoples Still and Spence. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tallahassee.
